---




### **Events:**
 - **mediaairplayrequest** - undefined

### **Slots:**
 - **enter** - An element shown when the media is not in AirPlay mode and pressing the button will open the AirPlay menu.
- **exit** - An element shown when the media is in AirPlay mode and pressing the button will open the AirPlay menu.
- **icon** - The element shown for the AirPlay button’s display.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--media-airplay-button-display** - `display` property of button. _(default: inline-flex)_
- **--media-primary-color** - Default color of text and icon. _(default: rgb(238 238 238))_
- **--media-secondary-color** - Default color of button background. _(default: rgb(20 20 30 / .7))_
- **--media-text-color** - `color` of button text. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-icon-color** - `fill` color of button icon. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-control-display** - `display` property of control. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-control-background** - `background` of control. _(default: var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .7)))_
- **--media-control-hover-background** - `background` of control hover state. _(default: rgba(50 50 70 / .7))_
- **--media-control-padding** - `padding` of control. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-control-height** - `line-height` of control. _(default: 24px)_
- **--media-font** - `font` shorthand property. _(default: var(--media-font-weight, bold) var(--media-font-size, 14px) / var(--media-text-content-height, var(--media-control-height, 24px)) var(--media-font-family, helvetica neue, segoe ui, roboto, arial, sans-serif))_
- **--media-font-weight** - `font-weight` property. _(default: bold)_
- **--media-font-family** - `font-family` property. _(default: helvetica neue, segoe ui, roboto, arial, sans-serif)_
- **--media-font-size** - `font-size` property. _(default: 14px)_
- **--media-text-content-height** - `line-height` of button text. _(default: var(--media-control-height, 24px))_
- **--media-button-icon-width** - `width` of button icon. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-button-icon-height** - `height` of button icon. _(default: var(--media-control-height, 24px))_
- **--media-button-icon-transform** - `transform` of button icon. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-button-icon-transition** - `transition` of button icon. _(default: undefined)_

tags.name: media-chrome-dialog
tags.description:
---




### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - Default slotted elements.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--media-primary-color** - Default color of text / icon. _(default: rgb(238 238 238))_
- **--media-secondary-color** - Default color of background. _(default: rgb(20 20 30 / .8))_
- **--media-text-color** - `color` of text. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-control-background** - `background` of control. _(default: var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .8)))_
- **--media-dialog-display** - `display` of dialog. _(default: inline-flex)_
- **--media-dialog-background** - `background` of dialog. _(default: var(--media-control-background, var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .8))))_
- **--media-dialog-border-radius** - `border-radius` of dialog. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-dialog-border** - `border` of dialog. _(default: none)_
- **--media-dialog-transition-in** - `transition` of dialog when showing. _(default: visibility 0s, opacity .2s ease-out, transform .15s ease-out)_
- **--media-dialog-transition-out** - `transition` of dialog when hiding. _(default: visibility .15s ease-in, opacity .15s ease-in, transform .15s ease-in)_
- **--media-dialog-visibility** - `visibility` of dialog when showing. _(default: visible)_
- **--media-dialog-hidden-visibility** - `visibility` of dialog when hiding. _(default: hidden)_
- **--media-dialog-opacity** - `opacity` of dialog when showing. _(default: 1)_
- **--media-dialog-hidden-opacity** - `opacity` of dialog when hiding. _(default: 0)_
- **--media-dialog-transform-in** - `transform` of dialog when showing. _(default: translateY(0) scale(1))_
- **--media-dialog-transform-out** - `transform` of dialog when hiding. _(default: translateY(2px) scale(.99))_
- **--media-font** - `font` shorthand property. _(default: var(--media-font-weight, normal) var(--media-font-size, 14px) / var(--media-text-content-height, var(--media-control-height, 24px)) var(--media-font-family, helvetica neue, segoe ui, roboto, arial, sans-serif))_
- **--media-font-weight** - `font-weight` property. _(default: normal)_
- **--media-font-family** - `font-family` property. _(default: helvetica neue, segoe ui, roboto, arial, sans-serif)_
- **--media-font-size** - `font-size` property. _(default: 14px)_
- **--media-text-content-height** - `line-height` of text. _(default: var(--media-control-height, 24px))_

tags.name: media-chrome-range
tags.description:
---




### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--media-primary-color** - Default color of range bar. _(default: rgb(238 238 238))_
- **--media-secondary-color** - Default color of range background. _(default: rgb(20 20 30 / .7))_
- **--media-control-display** - `display` property of control. _(default: inline-block)_
- **--media-control-padding** - `padding` of control. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-control-background** - `background` of control. _(default: var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .7)))_
- **--media-control-hover-background** - `background` of control hover state. _(default: rgb(50 50 70 / .7))_
- **--media-control-height** - `height` of control. _(default: 24px)_
- **--media-range-padding** - `padding` of range. _(default: var(--media-control-padding, 10px))_
- **--media-range-padding-left** - `padding-left` of range. _(default: var(--_media-range-padding))_
- **--media-range-padding-right** - `padding-right` of range. _(default: var(--_media-range-padding))_
- **--media-range-thumb-width** - `width` of range thumb. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-range-thumb-height** - `height` of range thumb. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-range-thumb-border** - `border` of range thumb. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-thumb-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range thumb. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-range-thumb-background** - `background` of range thumb. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-range-thumb-box-shadow** - `box-shadow` of range thumb. _(default: 1px 1px 1px transparent)_
- **--media-range-thumb-transition** - `transition` of range thumb. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-thumb-transform** - `transform` of range thumb. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-thumb-opacity** - `opacity` of range thumb. _(default: 1)_
- **--media-range-bar-color** - `background` of range progress. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-range-track-background** - `background` of range track background. _(default: rgb(255 255 255 / .2))_
- **--media-range-track-backdrop-filter** - `backdrop-filter` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-width** - `width` of range track. _(default: 100%)_
- **--media-range-track-height** - `height` of range track. _(default: 4px)_
- **--media-range-track-border** - `border` of range track. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-track-outline** - `outline` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-outline-offset** - `outline-offset` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range track. _(default: 1px)_
- **--media-range-track-box-shadow** - `box-shadow` of range track. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-track-transition** - `transition` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-translate-x** - `translate` x-coordinate of range track. _(default: 0px)_
- **--media-range-track-translate-y** - `translate` y-coordinate of range track. _(default: 0px)_
- **--media-time-range-hover-display** - `display` of range hover zone. _(default: block)_
- **--media-time-range-hover-bottom** - `bottom` of range hover zone. _(default: -5px)_
- **--media-time-range-hover-height** - `height` of range hover zone. _(default: max(100% + 5px, 20px))_
- **--media-range-track-pointer-background** - `background` of range track pointer. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-pointer-border-right** - `border-right` of range track pointer. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **track** - The runnable track of the range.
- **progress** - The progress part of the track.
- **thumb** - The thumb of the range.

### **Events:**

### **Slots:**

- **spacer** - A simple text space ( ) between the indicator and the text.
- **text** - The text content of the button, with a default of “LIVE”.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--media-live-button-display** - `display` property of button. _(default: inline-flex)_
- **--media-live-button-icon-color** - `fill` and `color` of not live button icon. _(default: rgb(140, 140, 140))_
- **--media-live-button-indicator-color** - `fill` and `color` of live button icon. _(default: rgb(255, 0, 0))_

### **Events:**

### **Slots:**
 - **off** - An element shown when the media is muted or the media’s volume is 0.

- **--media-button-icon-transition** - `transition` of button icon. _(default: undefined)_

### **Events:**
 - **undefined** - undefined

### **Slots:**
 - **preview** - An element that slides along the timeline to the position of the pointer hovering.
- **preview-arrow** - An arrow element that slides along the timeline to the position of the pointer hovering.
- **current** - An element that slides along the timeline to the position of the current time.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--media-time-range-display** - `display` property of range. _(default: inline-block)_
- **--media-preview-transition-property** - `transition-property` of range hover preview. _(default: visibility, opacity)_
- **--media-preview-transition-duration-out** - `transition-duration` out of range hover preview. _(default: .25s)_
- **--media-preview-transition-delay-out** - `transition-delay` out of range hover preview. _(default: 0s)_
- **--media-preview-transition-duration-in** - `transition-duration` in of range hover preview. _(default: .5s)_
- **--media-preview-transition-delay-in** - `transition-delay` in of range hover preview. _(default: .25s)_

- **--media-preview-thumbnail-box-shadow** - `box-shadow` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: 0 0 4px rgb(0 0 0 / .2))_
- **--media-preview-thumbnail-max-width** - `max-width` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: 180px)_
- **--media-preview-thumbnail-max-height** - `max-height` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: 160px)_
- **--media-preview-thumbnail-min-width** - `min-width` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: 120px)_
- **--media-preview-thumbnail-min-height** - `min-height` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: 80px)_
- **--media-preview-thumbnail-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: var(--media-preview-border-radius) var(--media-preview-border-radius) 0 0)_
- **--media-preview-thumbnail-border** - `border` of range preview thumbnail. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-preview-chapter-background** - `background` of range preview chapter display. _(default: var(--_preview-background))_
- **--media-preview-chapter-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range preview chapter display. _(default: 0)_
- **--media-preview-chapter-padding** - `padding` of range preview chapter display. _(default: 3.5px 9px 0)_
- **--media-preview-chapter-margin** - `margin` of range preview chapter display. _(default: 0)_
- **--media-preview-chapter-text-shadow** - `text-shadow` of range preview chapter display. _(default: 0 0 4px rgb(0 0 0 / .75))_
- **--media-preview-time-background** - `background` of range preview time display. _(default: var(--_preview-background))_
- **--media-preview-time-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range preview time display. _(default: 0 0 var(--media-preview-border-radius) var(--media-preview-border-radius))_
- **--media-preview-time-padding** - `padding` of range preview time display. _(default: 3.5px 9px)_

- **--media-preview-time-text-shadow** - `text-shadow` of range preview time display. _(default: 0 0 4px rgb(0 0 0 / .75))_
- **--media-box-display** - `display` of range box. _(default: flex)_
- **--media-box-margin** - `margin` of range box. _(default: 0 0 5px)_
- **--media-box-padding-left** - `padding-left` of range box. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-box-padding-right** - `padding-right` of range box. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-box-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range box. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-preview-box-display** - `display` of range preview box. _(default: var(--media-box-display, flex))_
- **--media-preview-box-margin** - `margin` of range preview box. _(default: var(--media-box-margin, 0 0 5px))_
- **--media-current-box-display** - `display` of range current box. _(default: var(--media-box-display, flex))_

- **--media-box-arrow-display** - `display` of range box arrow. _(default: inline-block)_

- **--media-box-arrow-border-width** - `border-width` of range box arrow. _(default: var(--media-box-arrow-height, 5px) var(--media-box-arrow-width, 6px) 0)_
- **--media-box-arrow-height** - `height` of range box arrow. _(default: 5px)_
- **--media-box-arrow-width** - `width` of range box arrow. _(default: 6px)_
- **--media-box-arrow-offset** - `translateX` offset of range box arrow. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-primary-color** - Default color of range bar. _(default: rgb(238 238 238))_
- **--media-secondary-color** - Default color of range background. _(default: rgb(20 20 30 / .7))_
- **--media-control-display** - `display` property of control. _(default: inline-block)_
- **--media-control-padding** - `padding` of control. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-control-background** - `background` of control. _(default: var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .7)))_
- **--media-control-hover-background** - `background` of control hover state. _(default: rgb(50 50 70 / .7))_
- **--media-control-height** - `height` of control. _(default: 24px)_
- **--media-range-padding** - `padding` of range. _(default: var(--media-control-padding, 10px))_
- **--media-range-padding-left** - `padding-left` of range. _(default: var(--_media-range-padding))_
- **--media-range-padding-right** - `padding-right` of range. _(default: var(--_media-range-padding))_
- **--media-range-thumb-width** - `width` of range thumb. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-range-thumb-height** - `height` of range thumb. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-range-thumb-border** - `border` of range thumb. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-thumb-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range thumb. _(default: 10px)_
- **--media-range-thumb-background** - `background` of range thumb. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-range-thumb-box-shadow** - `box-shadow` of range thumb. _(default: 1px 1px 1px transparent)_
- **--media-range-thumb-transition** - `transition` of range thumb. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-thumb-transform** - `transform` of range thumb. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-thumb-opacity** - `opacity` of range thumb. _(default: 1)_
- **--media-range-bar-color** - `background` of range progress. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-range-track-background** - `background` of range track background. _(default: rgb(255 255 255 / .2))_
- **--media-range-track-backdrop-filter** - `backdrop-filter` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-width** - `width` of range track. _(default: 100%)_
- **--media-range-track-height** - `height` of range track. _(default: 4px)_
- **--media-range-track-border** - `border` of range track. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-track-outline** - `outline` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-outline-offset** - `outline-offset` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-border-radius** - `border-radius` of range track. _(default: 1px)_
- **--media-range-track-box-shadow** - `box-shadow` of range track. _(default: none)_
- **--media-range-track-transition** - `transition` of range track. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-translate-x** - `translate` x-coordinate of range track. _(default: 0px)_
- **--media-range-track-translate-y** - `translate` y-coordinate of range track. _(default: 0px)_
- **--media-time-range-hover-display** - `display` of range hover zone. _(default: block)_
- **--media-time-range-hover-bottom** - `bottom` of range hover zone. _(default: -5px)_
- **--media-time-range-hover-height** - `height` of range hover zone. _(default: max(100% + 5px, 20px))_
- **--media-range-track-pointer-background** - `background` of range track pointer. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-range-track-pointer-border-right** - `border-right` of range track pointer. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **buffered** - A CSS part that selects the buffered bar element.
- **box** - A CSS part that selects both the preview and current box elements.
- **preview-box** - A CSS part that selects the preview box element.
- **current-box** - A CSS part that selects the current box element.
- **arrow** - A CSS part that selects the arrow element.
- **track** - The runnable track of the range.
- **progress** - The progress part of the track.
- **thumb** - The thumb of the range.

### **Events:**
 - **undefined** - undefined
- **change** - undefined

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - Default slotted elements.node
- **header** - An element shown at the top of the menu.
- **checked-indicator** - An icon element indicating a checked menu-item.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--media-primary-color** - Default color of text / icon. _(default: rgb(238 238 238))_
- **--media-secondary-color** - Default color of background. _(default: rgb(20 20 30 / .8))_
- **--media-text-color** - `color` of text. _(default: var(--media-primary-color, rgb(238 238 238)))_
- **--media-control-background** - `background` of control. _(default: var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .8)))_
- **--media-menu-display** - `display` of menu. _(default: inline-flex)_
- **--media-menu-layout** - Set to `row` for a horizontal menu design. _(default: undefined)_
- **--media-menu-flex-direction** - `flex-direction` of menu. _(default: row)_
- **--media-menu-gap** - `gap` between menu items. _(default: .25em)_
- **--media-menu-background** - `background` of menu. _(default: var(--media-control-background, var(--media-secondary-color, rgb(20 20 30 / .8))))_
- **--media-menu-border-radius** - `border-radius` of menu. _(default: undefined)_
